original_title: La virgen, la vieja, el viaje
overview: Rocio, a Colombian immigrant living in New York, is forced to work as a cleaner. After a phone call with her family, she learns that her grandmother is severely ill and is about to pass away. While communicating at a distance becomes more difficult, Rocio will use technology to say farewell her grandmother.
title: The Virgen, The Old Lady, The Journey
